resources.string:
based on Mini vMac 3.3.3 by Paul C. Pratt

Mini vMac contains the work of many people.
This version is maintained by:
Gil Osher (http://dolfin.github.com/minivmac4android)

Based on a version by:
Jesús A. Álvarez (http://namedfork.net)

Cannot read data directory: %1$s

This directory should contain a ROM file named "%2$s" and the disk images.

Please refer http://minivmac.sourceforge.net/doc/start.html for more info.

Cannot find ROM file: %1$s

This file should be named "%2$s" and should be put on a folder named "minivmac" on you external SD card, together with the disk images.

Please refer http://minivmac.sourceforge.net/doc/start.html for more info.
Sorry, I couldn\'t create the disk because an I/O error occurred. Make sure you got enough space on your SD card.
File already exists. Please choose a different disk name.
Fit target screen to host screen
Use the arrow keys to scroll the screen
